arm_group.description: Single dose 30 mg cevimeline capsule, then single dose 30 mg Evoxac capsule (after washout period)
Single dose 30 mg Evoxac capsule, then single dose 30 mg cevimeline capsule (after washout period)

brief_summary.textblock:
The objective of this study was to prove the bioequivalence of  Roxane Laboratories'
      Cevimeline 30 mg under fed conditions

clinical_study.brief_title: Crossover Bioequivalence Study of Cevimeline 30 mg Capsules Under Fed Conditions

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

        - No clinically significant abnormal findings on the physical examination, medical
        history, or clinical laboratory results during screening

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  Positive test for HIV, Hepatitis B, or Hepatitis C.

          -  Treatment with known enzyme altering drugs.

          -  History of allergic or adverse response to cevimeline or any comparable or similar
             product.

clinical_study.official_title: A Single Dose, Two-Period, Two-Treatment, Two-Way Crossover Bioequivalence Study of Cevimeline 30 mg Capsules Under Fed Conditions

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

primary_outcome.measure: bioequivalence determined by statistical comparison Cmax

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Bio-equivalence Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Open Label, Primary Purpose: Treatment
